Package seng.monsters.model

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
seng.monsters.model.Inventory
public final class Inventory extends Object
A collection for item used by trainer

    • use

      public void use(Item item, Monster mon) throws Inventory.ItemNotExistException, Item.NoEffectException
      Use a specific item in the inventory
      Parameters:
      item - The item
      mon - The monster to apply the item to
      Throws:
      Inventory.ItemNotExistException - If the index reference a non-existing item
      Item.NoEffectException - If the item produce no effect

    • remove

      public void remove(Item item) throws Inventory.ItemNotExistException
      Remove 1 count of Item
      Parameters:
      item - The item to be removed
      Throws:
      Inventory.ItemNotExistException - if the inventory holds 0 of the item
